attributes.action: To release biannually report on BAME Employees Pay Gap.
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the Government to:
1. To release biannually information Black, Asian and Ethnic Minority Pay Gap report of UK's employees.
2. The median pay gap to be calculated by comparing the difference in pay between the median pay of White British employees of all genders and the median pay of BAME employees of all genders.
attributes.background:
The median per hour pay of those of Pakistani and Bangladeshi origin was £10 and £9.60, marking a pay gap of 20% with white British. 

The ONS calculation, UK-born black African employees were paid 7.7% less than UK-born white British with similar occupation and education characteristics.
